League 1
PSG: the stat that hurts the matches played by Neymar in the capital!
Before the Paris Saint-Germain meeting against Club Bruges tonight in the Champions League, Opta Jean has found a disastrous statistics on matches played by Neymar in the capital.
06 Nov 2019, 19:25 by Florian Sermaise



The BeaujoireFC NantesIcon Sport



Auguste-DelauneStadium of ReimsIcon Sport



Stade de l'AubeTroyesIcon Sport



Geoffroy-Guichard ASSEIcon Sport



Michel-d'OrnanoCalenbrake CaenIcon Sport Stadium

PSG: 5 stages of Ligue 1 that Neymar does not know




Victim of a tendon breakdown in mid-October, Neymar will not necessarily be the party tonight, on the occasion of the reception of Bruges in the Champions League. If the Brazilian has returned to training in recent days, it will miss a meeting again under the colors of Paris Saint-Germain. It's simple: Paris will play its 64th match in all competitions without the former Barcelona since its in the capital in August 2017. One more than the number of games played by Neymar with the champions of France! A disastrous statistic reported by Opta Jean, below.
